content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day August 5, 2021 What is Business Email Compromise BEC? August 5, 2021 Business Email Compromise BEC  also known as email account compromise EAC  is a type of phishing or social engineering attack intended to scam organizations out of money through the impersonation of executives. Business Email Compromise Scams BEC Techniques How does BEC work?
